sub_title: Lead Technician Shipping at Biological Critical Reagents  Global HUB  MSD
summary:
Experience in analytical chemistry.
Experience in packaging (primary and secondary), labelling and distribution world wide of medication intended for clinical trials.

Specialties: Analysing a large number of  tablet batches in one day.
With the goal to do every time more batches in one day.

My profile – who am I?
Each successful team distinguishes itself by consisting of a balanced group.
Thinkers and doers, energetic / flexible and introverted people.
However, without any connecting factor, all these sorts of people remain separate individuals.
My strength / what characterizes me is that I am the ‘connecting force’ who is able to link different personalities and to get and keep everybody focussed on a common goal.
I am a person who likes to have a key role when it comes to project work and I do not evade new challenges.
Moreover, I think it is important that there is a good workplace-results balance. My way of work is by means of a stimulating positive approach in which I really value establishing a good working relationship with my colleagues.

Dr. Phil's Sweet 16:

1.  Defined image
2.  Perception of uniqueness
3.  Play "big"
4.  Accept praise
5.  Become essential
6.  Know your real currency
7.  Always have a plan
8.  Keep things "close to the vest"
9.  Investigatory mode
10. Behave your way to success
11. Keep options open
12. Master the system
13. Nucleus of supporters
14. Deal only with truth
15. Use others' ego
16. Pick your battles

education.field_of_study: Yellow belt lean six sigma certification

profile_positions.description:
*Coordinate planning of the daily activities of the Sr. Technicians in consultation with the Supervisor      *Inventory Management & Shipping, by using MPS tools to achieve level loaded capacity
*Leads Shipping Tier and Planning Tier
*Ensures adequate visual management is in place to have overview of all ongoing shipments
*Actively participate in Tier 1
*Maintain metrics to show shipping on-time in-full delivery (OTIF) and customer service level (CSL) *Preparation of all required documentation of shipments
*Communicate with internal and external customers, e.g. regarding lead times and pick-up dates · *Cooperate with external shipping partners and act as a representative of the Shipping team.
**Manage / support the requests from the customers (MSD Laboratories, contract Laboratories, regulatory agencies) for shipments
*Close collaboration with the BCR Hub lead and planners on shipping of BCRs to manage inventory
*Conform to current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMp) as they apply to the shipping and maintenance activities

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for planning and coordinating the laboratory section Steriles (15 people).
Implementing Lean lab planning.
profile_positions.title: Lab planner / scheduler / Lab specialist level 1 at QC-AC Section Steriles

profile_positions.description:
I am a member of the project group implementing lean in the lab.
With the help of consultancy firm BSM Ireland.
BSM Ireland has developed Lean methodologies and solutions specific to the lab environment that substantially improve organization and measurable performance.
profile_positions.title: Lean lab project member Section at QC-AC Steriles

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for planning and coordinating the laboratory section Steriles (15 people).
Implementing Lean lab planning.
profile_positions.title: Lab planner / scheduler / Lab technician 3 at Quality Controle Analytical Chemistry Section Steriles

profile_positions.description:
Conducting chemical analyses on raw materials, intermediate products, final products steriles and tablets, stability samples and reference standards according to the applicable specifications and procedures.
 
• Executing analysis on several systems HPLC, TLC, dissolution, moisture content, disintegration, friability,UV-VIS spectrometry, specific optical rotation, titrations, extractable volume,  physical tests Pharmacopeia JP, Pheur and USP etc.).
 • Support general tasks like general house keeping of the lab, 5S, taking charge of reagent and chemicals,change control on procedures etc.
 • Ensure a safe and clean work environment.
 • Correct and accurate reporting of tasks according to applicable procedures.
 • Interpretation of data and results and comparison of results in accordance with the applicable specifications. Reporting of Out Of Specification results to QC-management.
 • Able to start up and complete investigations related to OOS/OOT results, including accompanying tasks.
 • Review of data on correctness, accuracy and completeness.
 • Able to detect data trends in overviews and reports them to QC Management.
 • Executing of practical validation tasks and reporting of data in accordance with the applicable procedures.
 • Support and contribute cGMP’s and cGLP’s.
 • Notification of necessary adjustments to procedures/data forms in order to assure timely correction.
 • Following of function related training/education/courses where needed and maintaining the general training status.
 • Able to detect areas for improvement and make proposals to improve the QC quality systems, process flows and/or working environment.
 • Train other technicians in (new) assays in order to increase technical skills and knowledge.
 • Participates in project teams.
profile_positions.title: Lab techician level 3 (senior) at Quality Controle Analytical Chemistry Section Steriles
